channel.title: Comments on: I’ve finally started my food blog!

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: awwww! I thought ?I would read your very first post. And what a great way to start your blog! The food looks amazing, and can I just say that in only the short few months your blog has thrived and is definitely one of my favs!
item.content:encoded: awwww! I thought ?I would read your very first post. And what a great way to start your blog! The food looks amazing, and can I just say that in only the short few months your blog has thrived and is definitely one of my favs!

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: The food at your wedding looks fantastic! It's so important to have good quality food-I think it's one of the more memorable aspects for some.
item.content:encoded: The food at your wedding looks fantastic! It’s so important to have good quality food-I think it’s one of the more memorable aspects for some.

item.title: By: Victoria
item.dc:creator: Victoria
item.description:
Hey anita, cool blog and sweet idea of combining your family's expertise- I remember their wonderful catering abilities at your engag-ment party. Just wondering, is there any way of getting the food through the internet into my mouth? I like the look of those portugese tarts! Otherwise I'll just have to make them myself!
- Victoria
item.content:encoded:
Hey anita, cool blog and sweet idea of combining your family’s expertise- I remember their wonderful catering abilities at your engag-ment party.
Just wondering, is there any way of getting the food through the internet into my mouth? I like the look of those portugese tarts! Otherwise I’ll just have to make them myself!

– Victoria

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/ive-finally-started-my-food-blog/comment-page-1/#comment-9">Goober boy</a>.
Hi Goober boy I'll be updating my blog soon with some recipes, as I've only just started blogging and designing the site, so check back in a little while. Anita
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Goober boy.

Hi Goober boy
I’ll be updating my blog soon with some recipes, as I’ve only just started blogging and designing the site, so check back in a little while.
Anita

item.title: By: Goober boy
item.dc:creator: Goober boy
item.description: So...... where are the recipies? I want to eat the food not just see it.
item.content:encoded: So…… where are the recipies? I want to eat the food not just see it.

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/ive-finally-started-my-food-blog/comment-page-1/#comment-7">Nick</a>.
Hi Nick I'm pretty sure the food at your wedding was equally as nice as mine. Thanks for your help with my blog - and our food too!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nick.

Hi Nick
I’m pretty sure the food at your wedding was equally as nice as mine.
Thanks for your help with my blog – and our food too!

item.title: By: Nick
item.dc:creator: Nick
item.description:
Oooh! I like the sound of all that. I wish the food at my wedding was as nice looking as yours! ;)
Good to see your first post up. Looking forward to many more.
Nick
item.content:encoded:
Oooh! I like the sound of all that. I wish the food at my wedding was as nice looking as yours! ðŸ˜‰

Good to see your first post up. Looking forward to many more.

Nick
